name: bd4472b8.json

description.object: In the input, you should see...a color pattern of either 2, 3 or 4 various colors
description.size: The output grid size...is the same size as the input grid.
description.description: To make the output, you have to...start on the third row (after the row of gray) and make the entire third row the same as the first color in the first row, then make the entire fourth row the same as the second color in the first row and so on for the next color.  Once all colors have been done, then repeat the same pattern.
